value.title: Keep Autonomous Killing Machines Off Our Streets | Opinion
value.excerpt: Robots are not, yet, autonomous killing machines. Even the rule briefly considered in San Francisco, would have kept a human operator in the decision loop.

value.title: Girl Scout mom kicked out of Radio City and barred from seeing Rockettes after facial recognition tech identified her
value.excerpt: The mom and lawyers like her who work for firms that are suing Radio City's parent company, MSG Entertainment, are barred from setting foot in its venues while litigation is ongoing.

value.title: Tesla ‘full self-driving’ triggered an eight-car crash, a driver tells police
value.excerpt: A driver told authorities that their Tesla's "full-self-driving" software braked unexpectedly and triggered an eight-car pileup in the San Francisco Bay Area last month that led to nine people being treated for minor injuries including one juvenile who was hospitalized,

value.title: AWS Re:Invent 2022 Aims To Evolve Telcos Into Tech-Cos
value.excerpt: Vice President, Security, Carriers and Enterprise Networking, Will Townsend. The Amazon Web Services (AWS) re:Invent conference is decidedly back post-pandemic. He would like to share his insights into some of the more exciting telecom news and announcements that emerged from re:Invent.

value.title: Model Engineering College to set up centre of excellence in AI, Robotics
value.excerpt: APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University (KTU) has set apart ₹10 crore for the first phase of the project. The centre will come up at a space of around 60,000 sq.ft. The centre has been proposed as a separate entity under the university to undertake advanced research in AI,

value.title: Who Ultimately Owns Content Generated By ChatGPT And Other AI Platforms?
value.excerpt: The model for ChatGPT is trained on a corpus of created works and it is still unclear what the legal precedent may be for reuse of this content, if it was derived from the intellectual property of others,

value.title: Announcing the updated Salesforce connector (V2) for Amazon Kendra
value.excerpt: Amazon Kendra is a highly accurate and simple-to-use intelligent search service powered by machine learning (ML). value.title: Ukraine has become the world’s testing ground for military robots
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence-powered vehicles have been used in war for decades, but the Russian War on Ukraine is the modern world's testing bed.

value.title: Inworld AI drives toward better AI characters in games with grants and Santa demo
value.excerpt: Avatars have been around for a lot of video game history, but for most of that history, players would never mistake those characters for the humans they imitate. Inworld AI wants to change that by infusing AI into virtual characters to make them smarter than ever.

value.title: AI In Big Pharma: The First Antibody Designed Using AI In The Clinic
value.excerpt: In recent years, a hand full of AI startup companies that managed to utilize AI/ML to discover novel targets and/or design therapeutics reached human clinical trials and received massive media attention.

value.title: AI In Space And Its Future Use In Warfare

value.title: Female Founder Of Cybersecurity Startup Builds Better Response To Threats
value.excerpt: Finding a security intrusion is only half the problem. The other half is remediating the problem. A startup, founded by a woman, has the solution to both. And funders are interested.

value.title: Pointedly Asking Generative AI ChatGPT About Whether Santa Claus Is Real Proves To Be Eye-Opening, Including For AI Ethics And AI Law
value.excerpt: I went ahead and asked the popular generative AI app ChatGPT about whether Santa Claus is real or not. Doing so provides a bonanza of AI Ethics and AI Law considerations. Enjoy this during especially during the upcoming holidays!

value.title: A Vision For Self-Driving Ops, And How Observability Can Help Us Get There
value.excerpt: Though self-driving ops are presently in the realm of science fiction (and some might say fantasy for overworked ITOps, DevOps and cloud teams), we’re beginning to see glimpses of what a future driven by autonomous operations might look like.

value.title: 6 Reasons Voice Shopping Is The Future Of M-Commerce
value.excerpt: As a rapidly growing m-commerce trend, voice shopping is an avenue online retailers should be considering for their business operations.

value.title: Three best practices for ML/AI security
value.excerpt: Two-in-five organizations will have experienced an AI security or privacy breach, with one in four of those being adversarial attacks. Security industry watchdogs have been ringing alarm bells for years.

value.title: EKA Mobility, NuPort Robotics release Level 2- enabled ADAS e-bus

value.title: The retail AI industry takes stock as the holiday season wraps up

value.title: Sea Machines and USCG partner on computer vision domain awareness

value.title: Tech Tuesday: Super Mario World, handwriting AI, robots climbing walls
value.excerpt: From Super Mario World to Google taking on doctor’s handwriting and robot dogs that can climb walls, tech expert Greg Nibler joined AM Extra for the latest tech news.
